title: Kluz Peace Prize 2022
tagline: Celebrating those who promote peace and resolve conflicts
description_html:
The 2022 Kluz Prize for PeaceTech was facilitated by the Global PeaceTech Hub at the Florence School of Transnational Governance (European University Institute), and awarded at the Global PeaceTech Conference.

The Kluz Peace Prize is awarded annually to individuals or groups who have made a significant contribution to the promotion of peace and the resolution of conflicts. The prize was established in 2020 by the Kluz Foundation, a non-profit organization dedicated to promoting peace and social justice around the world.
